scripts.build: antlr4ng -o ./lib -Dlanguage=JavaScript -visitor -listener *.g4 && babel src/*.js --ignore src/visitor.js --out-file-extension .min.js --out-dir src --presets=@babel/preset-env --plugins=@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs && babel src/index.min.js --out-dir src --plugins=./utils/babel-plugin-require-minify.js && babel-minify $(ls src/*.min.js | grep -v visitor.min.js) --out-dir src && babel lib --out-dir lib --plugins=@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs
scripts.pkg: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && pkg --targets node14-linux-x64,node14-linuxstatic-x64,node14-win-x64,node14-macos-x64,node14-linux-arm64,node14-linuxstatic-arm64,node14-win-arm64,node14-macos-arm64 --compress Brotli --no-bytecode --public --out-path ./dist src/index.min.js && for f in dist/index.min*; do mv "$f" "${f/index.min/index}"; done
scripts.publish: git tag -a "$TAG" -m "Release $TAG" && gh release create "$TAG" --title "Release $TAG" --notes "$NOTES" -R https://github.com/FreshPenguin112/pangscript ./dist/* && rm -rf ./dist ./src/*.min.*
